_header: Saint Edward the young martyr was king of England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Edward the Elder, saint, life of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, f. 199v: prose.
_description: Life of St. Edward the Elder in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Edward þe ȝungue was kyng of EnguelondeWel
                    ȝoung he i martred was þoruȝ tricherie and
                    onde…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nov god for þe loue of heom boþe þet swete kingues
                    wereTo þe Ioye of heouene þat huy beoth inne with heom us bringue
                    þere
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 47-53.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Edward þe ȝong martir was king of engelondeful
                    ȝong martired he was bi trecherie & onde…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of hem boþe þat oure kinges
                    wereto þe ioye of heuen us bring With hem boþe
                    þere

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint edeward þe ȝonge marter was kyng of ingelondewel
                    ȝong I martret he was wit trecherye & onde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…bote good hit is wel to don whodir we euer wendeȝIhesus
                    for þyn holy name heuene blis þu us sende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Edward þe ȝonge Martir was kyng of EngelondeWel
                    ȝong he i Martired was þorwh tricherie and onde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for þe loue of hem boþe þat beyne vr kynges
                    wereTo þe Ioye of heuene wiþ hem vs bringe þere. A.M.E.N.
                    Amen

          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Edward þe ȝonge martir was kyng of engelondeWel
                    ȝong ymartred he was þoru trecherie & onde…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god uor þeloue of boþe þat our kynges
                    wereTo þe Ioie of heuene þat hi beþ Inne wiþ hem bringe
                    ous þere

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint edward þe ȝonge marter was king of ingelondewol
                    ȝong he was martired þour treccherie and onde…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…God for þe loue of hem boþe þat goode kingis
                    wereTo þe ioye of heuyn þere þei ben to hem bringe vs
                    þere

                    ȝong ymartered he was þurȝ trecherie &
                    onde…

OxfTri57.First Lines:
…ffor with oute schedynge of blod ne worþ neuere þe
                    senne y doOf þe lond folki of Engeland þat no gult haueþ
                    þer to…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe sone of hem boþe þat oure kynges
                    wereTo þe ioye of heuene vs bringe to hem þere

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seint Edward þe ȝonge martir was king of engelondeWel
                    ȝong ymartred he was þoru tricherie & onde…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou god for loue of hom boþe þat oure kinges wereTo
                    þe ioie of heuene þat hi beoþ Inne wiþ hom bringe us
                    þere

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Edward þe ȝonge Martyr was kyng of EngelondeWel
                    ȝong ymartred he was þorw tricherie and onde…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god ffor þe loue of ham boþe þat oure kynges
                    wereTo þe ioye of heuene vs bringe þat hi beoþ ynne
                    þere

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint edward þe marter was king of englondeȝong marter he
                    was with trecherie & onde…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now god for loue of hem boþe þat oure kinges wereTo
                    þe Ioie of heuene with hem bringe ous alle þere

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
…Chast and wis of consel bot pride he louyd lestWild men
                    louyd he not that reccheles wer of thoȝt…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…After anghelmas a forutenyȝt his day falles in the
                    ȝerAnd at the mydde festene saynt Edward the martir
CamFitzMc128.Note: Begins imperfectly due to loss of folios.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint Edward þe ȝong mastir was king of ynglondwel ȝong ymartiret he was þorou tricheri & onde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …now god for loue of hom bode þat oure kinges wereto þe Ioie of heuen þat hi beþ Inne with hom bring our dere
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 44v).

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt Edward þe ȝonge martir was kinge of engelondeWel ȝonge ymartrid he was þorȝ trecherie & onde…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou god vor þe loue of hom boþe þat oure kinges wertTo Ve ioye of heuene ous bringe & fram helle þat we be skere

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Edward þe ȝonge martir was kyng of EnglondWel
                    ȝonge he was martired þurȝ trecherye &
                    onde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…After myghelmasse a fourtenyȝt his day falles in þe
                    ȝereAnd at þe mydde festene saynt Edward þe
                    martir

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Edward þe ȝong marter was kyng of EngelondeFul yong
                    matred he was þorgh trechery & onde…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of both þat our kynggis wereTo
                    þe Ioye of heuene wher þei be in bryng vs alle þere.
                    Amen.
TokyoTak54.Attributed Title:
Vita Sancti Edwardi Regis & marteris (f. 33); Here endeth
                    þe glorious lif of seint Edward (f. 36v)
